root.name: Superstars V8 Next Challenge
root.description: Cars There are 12 different cars in the game, but there are 19 drivers with their own design. Stefano Gabellini - BMW 550i Roberto Papini - BMW M5 Mauro Cesari - BMW M5 Bruno Bollini - BMW 500i Roberto Sisala - BMW M3 E92 Kristian Ghedina - BMW 500i Gianni Morbinelli - BMW M3 E90 Francesco Ascani - BMW M3 E90 Ermanno Dionisio - Jaguar S Type RAlessandro Cacciari - Jaguar S Type R Roberto Sperati - BMW M3 E92 Roberto Russo - BMW M3 E92 Pierluigi Martini - Chrysler 300c SRT 8 Roberto Benedetti - Cadillac CST-V Roberto Del Castello - Cadillac CST-V Massino Pigoli - Mercedes C63 Andiea Chiesa - Maserati Quattroporte Fabrizio Armetta - Chevrolet CR8 Filipe Albuquerque - Audi R54 CoursesAll Courses are taken from real world tracks that the Superstars League uses Adria Magiore Mugello Portimao Vallelugya Monza Kyalami Lmola As well as 3 addition track that the player will unlock after the racing school is complete. Track Conditions Track conditions dynamically change as the race proceeds. If the weather conditions are dry, then the track will start to display tire wear from where the riving lineIf the weather conditions are wet, then the track will start to dry where the driving line is.
